name: Binance-Peg Bitcoin Cash
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Tokens that are wrapped and pegged by Binance on a 1:1 ratio to the corresponding native token. Also supports BEP20 token deposits and withdrawals at Binance.com
